articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Moon Jae In
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Moon Jae In
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, who is heading a high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Friday attended the pre-opening ceremony reception held before the 23rd Winter Olympics and met with Moon Jae In, president of south Korea.
					 Kim Yong Nam exchanged warm greetings with Moon Jae In and had a photo session with him.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam also exchanged greetings with heads of states and governments of different countries who came to attend the opening ceremony of the Olympics at the said reception.

articles.title: 23rd Winter Olympics Opens
articles.content:
23rd Winter Olympics Opens
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Winter Olympics opened in Phyongchang of south Korea.
					 Its opening ceremony was held at Phyongchang Olympic Stadium on Friday.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, who is heading a high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and Kim Yo Jong, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, took the platform of the opening ceremony.
					
					 Present there were members of a high-level delegation of the DPRK and its National Olympic Committee delegation, art troupe and cheering group and a cheering group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Attending it were President Moon Jae In and personages of political and social circles of south Korea, President of the International Olympic Committee Thomas Bach, heads of state and government of different countries, foreign guests and sports fans. 
					
					 The players participating in the 23rd Winter Olympics from across the world entered the stadium.
					
					 Spectators broke into cheers and applause as players of the north and the south of Korea entered the stadium, led by the flag of the Korean Peninsula amid the playing of the song "Arirang."
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yo Jong and President Moon Jae In and his wife all stood up to wave to the players of the north and the south.
					
					 The participants in the opening ceremony warmly encouraged the players of the north and the south who were marching together holding the flag of the Korean peninsula bearing the Korean map
					
					 The chairman of the Olympic Organizing Committee and the IOC president made congratulatory speeches before President Moon Jae In declared the Winter Olympics open.
					
					 The Olympic flag was hoisted amid the playing of the song of Olympics and the Olympics oath was made.
					
					 There took place a ceremony of lighting the cauldron of the Olympics.
					
					 Prior to the ceremony, Taekwon-Do players from the north and the south of Korea gave a demonstration performance.
					
					 That day Kim Yo Jong, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, exchanged warm greetings with President Moon Jae In shaking hands with him.
					
					 The 23rd Winter Olympics will close on Feb. 25.

articles.title: U.S. "2018 Nuclear Posture Review" Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. "2018 Nuclear Posture Review" Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee in a statement on Saturday said that the U.S. has come under fire worldwide for its "2018 Nuclear Posture Review" (NPR) as it poses a serious threat to the peace of the Korean Peninsula and the world and deals with an extremely dangerous nuclear attempt which will result in a new cold war.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The NPR stipulates that since the DPRK as well as China, Russia and Iran pose a "serious threat" to the U.S. and its allies, the U.S. will start updating the strategic nuclear weapons and developing the "low intensity smaller nuclear weapons" to cope with the "threat" and that it will use nukes to counter the non-nuclear weapons attack on the U.S. and its allies as well as nuclear attack on them.
					
					 In particular, describing the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrent as a "threat" to the world peace, the U.S. virtually legalized the updating of nukes and the preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. let out a stream of provocative outbursts that it would never pardon the DPRK's nuclear attack on the U.S. and its allied nations, the DPRK would never exist after using nukes and any attack by the latter would lead to the "end of the regime".
					
					 It indicates that the reckless nuclear hysteria of the Trump group has reached an extreme phase as it has been hell-bent on stifling the DPRK by force of arms by misrepresenting its just access to nuclear weapons to cope with the nuclear threat of aggression from the U.S. This is another intolerable provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The NPR is a war declaration of the rogue state as it is a criminal war document making the preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK a fait accompli and means to dare make a preemptive nuclear strike at the world including the Korean Peninsula and unleash a nuclear war.
					
					 The gangster-like U.S. is pulling up the DPRK over "nuclear threat" and "denuclearization" while threatening to use nukes as conventional weapons though it has possessed the largest number of nukes in the world. It is the height of impudence and action that a guilty party files the suit first.
					
					 The reality eloquently shows it was a wise option that the DPRK accomplished the historic great cause of completing its state nuclear forces true to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts to cope with the increasing nuclear threat from the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to run amuck, well aware that it will meet its miserable doom while recklessly brandishing its nuclear stick of tyranny, obsessed with the anachronistic design for world hegemony.

articles.title: Stamp Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Stamp Exhibition Opens 
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A collection of Korean stamps was displayed at the Korean Stamps Museum and the Korean Stamp Exhibition House on Saturday on the occasions of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 30th anniversary of naming of immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					 On display at the exhibition halls are photos reflecting stamps bearing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hundreds of kinds of stamps under the themes of "Sun of Mankind" and "Sunny Smile" comprehensively deal with the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who rose up as the bright star over Mt Paektu and provided a solid foundation for accomplishing the human cause of independence, the socialist cause.
					
					 There are stamps portraying immortal flower Kimjongilia and gift plants.
					
					 Some stamps deal with the stirring reality of the country in which a great heyday of prosperity is opened up and all the wishes of the people come true under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibition will last until Feb. 18.

articles.title: Nepalese Political Party Delegation Arrives

Nepalese Political Party Delegation Arrives

articles.title: Korean Folk Song "Arirang", World Intangible Cultural Heritage
articles.content:
Korean Folk Song "Arirang", World Intangible Cultural Heritage
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- "Arirang" is a world-known song representing Korea and a precious musical heritage symbolic of the Korean nation, as it reflects the national emotion, soul and sentiment of Koreans.
					 After occupying Korea in the early years of last century, the Japanese imperialists had persisted in eliminating this popular song which stirred the spirit of resistance to them, but failed to do so.
					
					 Thanks to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for protecting national heritage, the song has been widely sung century after century, preserving the national characteristics.
					
					 Grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" with the song as its seed took place in Pyongyang to show the wisdom and stamina of the Korean nation all over the world and was registered in the Guinness Book of World Records in August Juche 96 (2007).
					
					 UNESCO in its article on the registration of folk song "Arirang" as a typical intangible cultural heritage of humanity said that the song is a popular folk song which has been sung not only by families, friends and collective but also on different occasions like holiday. The article continued that the song was handed down verbally, but exists in such diverse forms as traditional, orchestral and modern musical ones through its recreation, and sings about parting and reunion and sorrow, joy and happiness with soft and lyric melodies.
					
					 "Arirang" is conducive to mutual respect and peaceful social development by fostering social relations, the article stressed.

articles.title: DPRK Newspapers Flay Pence's Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
DPRK Newspapers Flay Pence's Confrontation Racket
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers Saturday carry a commentary by Kim Chol Myong blasting U.S. Vice-President Pence for his anti-DPRK balderdash.
					 Pence, who is visiting south Korea to attend the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics, is rebuffed and blasted at home and abroad for his anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria unfit for the atmosphere of the Olympics, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Pence let out a torrent of abuse pointing an accusing finger at the others' event, instead of just sitting to watch it as a guest. His behavior is nothing but an ugly sight being reminded of crazy Trump.
					
					 We never sent the high-level delegation to south Korea in order to create the possibility of a dialogue with Americans by meeting them who are not worth human beings.
					
					 We do not do such mean and nasty things like the U.S. abusing such sports festival as Olympics for a political purpose. 
					
					 We are ready for a variety of plans to cope with any attempts of the U.S., such as military strike, sanctions and pressure and confrontational racket.
					
					 Pence must know that his frantic acts of abusing the sacred Olympics for confrontational ruckus are as foolish and stupid an act as sweeping the sea with a broom.
					
					 As exemplified by the Winter Olympics that opened with splendor by the concerted efforts of the north and the south, the whole Korean nation's ardent aspirations and wishes for concord, unity and reunification can't be dampened with anything.
					
					 If Pence wants to avoid experiencing a hot agony of shame on the stage of the Olympics, he had better stop behaving imprudently and clearly learn about how ardently the compatriots of the north and the south of Korea wish to reunify the country by their concerted efforts and quietly disappear.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Trump
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Trump
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Trump, in his recent "state of the union address", talked nonsense that he would continue pursuing the maximum pressure policy, claiming that the DPRK threatens the U.S. mainland by pressing ahead with the "reckless nuclear and missile program".
					 Letting out a stream of abuse at the best people-centered socialist system of our country through "brutality", "oppression" and other reckless remarks, he revealed his intention to go more frantic with the "human rights" smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 He blustered that his administration would not repeat the same mistakes as what the former administrations made.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Saturday says it is nothing but a reckless action of an old lunatic man.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As a president he should have had elementary ability to judge the trend around the world.
					
					 However Trump made the "state of the union address" full of invectives and abuse without political knowledge and private opinion, which more clearly revealed that he is an old lunatic and ringleader of gangsters.
					
					 If it had not seriously threatened the rights to independence, existence and development of the DPRK with nukes of tyranny, the U.S. would not have been driven into the present miserable plight.
					
					 Trump had better stop engaging himself in the campaign of sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while uttering that the mistakes of the past administrations would not be repeated and go earlier to a psychiatric ward after reading a history book to learn the reason why the predecessors drank the cup of bitter setbacks in confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: More Truth behind Kwangju Massacre Disclosed
articles.content:
More Truth behind Kwangju Massacre Disclosed
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- More information about the barbaric massacre of the participants in the Kwangju Popular Uprising by the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique was reportedly revealed in south Korea.
					 The May 18 Special Investigation Committee collected and analyzed data of 620 000 pages and carried out survey among 190 military units and 120 military persons, who had been concerned with the case at that time, for five months to find out that Chun Doo Hwan ordered several times from May 21, 1980 to strafe the resistant fighters and citizens from gunships.
					
					 Accordingly, more than 40 helicopters mobilized for putting down the uprising strafed Kwangju citizens on May 21 and 27.
					
					 Information also proved that bombers and fighters were on standby with live bullets aboard to bomb Kwangju City.
					
					 It was confirmed that the crackdown on Kwangju uprisers was directly conducted by Chun and the three services of south Korea were mobilized for it.

articles.title: S. Korea: U.S. and Conservative Forces Slammed for Straining Tension
articles.content:
S. Korea: U.S. and Conservative Forces Slammed for Straining Tension
 Pyongyang February 10 (KCNA) -- The People's Party of south Korea held an emergency rally in Seoul on Feb. 5 to denounce the U.S. and the conservative forces standing against the peace on the Korean Peninsula, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the rally the speakers censured Trump of the U.S. for saying that nobody knows what happens after Phyongchang Olympics and the vice-president for saying that the "period of strategic patience" has ended.
					
					 They charged that Trump the support rating for whom has gone into tailspin within the U.S. is heightening the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They contended that the U.S., Japan calling for U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises after the Olympics and the "Liberal Korea Party" clamoring about "coloring theory" are the three forces undermining the Olympics.
					
					 They urged a total stop to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises and called on the "government" to stop "loud speaker broadcasting against the north" at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia on Jan. 30 to mark the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to continue holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and elucidates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Russia on Feb. 2.
					 Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee consisting of prominent figures of Russia decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on those occasions.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Italy
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Rome on Jan. 29.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Communist Party of Italy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed a celebration period from Jan. 29 to the end of February and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar, film show and book and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Poland, Ukraine and Spain between Jan. 20 and 26 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Personages of Poland praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people, saying that the DPRK could make rapid progress by smashing all the challenges of the hostile forces with invincible military strength, thanks to the solid foundation consolidated by him.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Lvov of Ukraine said that the Korean people could work world-startling miracles and innovations thanks to the unique Songun politics of Kim Jong Il in the most difficult period of the Korean revolution. His august name as a great man will shine in the modern history of Korea, the chairman stressed.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting in Spain said that the whole life of Kim Jong Il is the one devoted to the country and its people and the one shining with noble internationalist obligation with which he rendered material and moral assistance to the countries and peoples desiring independence.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Moon Jae In
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Moon Jae In
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y jefe de la delegacion de alto nivel de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 9 con el presidente surcoreano Moon Jae In en el acto de bienvenida efectuado en visperas de la ceremonia inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					  KIm Yong Nam y Moon Jae In intercambiaron el saludo cordial y se fotografiaron.
					
					  Y en el mismo lugar el presidente de la APS de la RPDC saludo con los jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises que vinieron a participar en la ceremonia inaugural de estos juegos.

articles.title: Inaugurados los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales
articles.content:
Inaugurados los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedaron inaugurados en Phyongchang del Sur de Corea los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					  La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el estadio olimpico de Phyongchang.
					
					  Tomaron asientos en la tribuna Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y jefe de la delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC, y Kim Yo Jong, primera subjefa de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion de alto nivel, la del Comite Olimpico Nacional, el grupo artistico y el de hinchas, de la RPDC, asi como el de hinchas de coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					  Participaron el presidente Moon Jae In y las personalidades de los circulos politicos y sociales del Sur de Corea, el presidente del Comite Olimpico Internacional Thomas Bach, los jefes de Estado y de gobierno de varios paises del mundo, los huespedes extranjeros y los aficionados al deporte.
					
					Entraron los jugadores y otras personas de varios paises y regiones participantes en la Olimpiada.
					
					  En medio de la interpretacion de la cancion coreana "Arirang", los jugadores del Norte y el Sur de Corea con la bandera de reunificacion al frente de la fila entraron en la sede de la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					  Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yo Jong y el matrimonio del presidente Moon Jae In enviaron saludos agitandoles las manos.
					
					  Los participantes en el acto estimularon a los jugadores coreanos del Norte y el Sur que marchan juntos bajo la bandera de reunificacion con el mapa de Corea.
					
					  Los presidentes del comite organizador del presente festival deportivo y del Comite Olimpico Internacional pronunciaron discursos de felicitacion y el presidente surcoreano Moon Jae In anuncio la inauguracion.
					
					  Mientras se interpreta la cancion olimpica, se izo la bandera olimpica y se realizo el juramento.
					
					  Seguidamente, se efectuo la ceremonia de encendimiento de la antorcha.
					
					  Con anterioridad al acto inaugural, se realizo la demostracion modelo de los taekwondocas del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Este dia, Kim Yo Jong, primera subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, apreto la mano e intercambio los saludos cordiales con el presidente Moon Jae In y su esposa.
					
					  Los Juegos Olimpicos se clausuraran el dia 25.

articles.title: CCPAP rechaza el "reporte de revision del estado nuclear de 2018" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CCPAP rechaza el "reporte de revision del estado nuclear de 2018" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- El "reporte de revision del estado nuclear de 2018", recien publicado por EE.UU., muestra su intento de amenazar gravemente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo y provocar la nueva guerra fria y la nuclear. Por esta razon, ese documento es condenado y repudiado por todos los coreanos y la sociedad internacional.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 10 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					En el reporte, EE.UU. estipulo que iniciara la modernizacion de armas nucleares estrategicas y el desarrollo de "miniartefacto nuclear de baja intensidad" para hacer frente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que al igual que China, Rusia e Iran, constituye "seria amenaza" para el y sus aliados. Anoto ademas que usara el arma nuclear cuando el y sus aliados reciban el ataque nuclear o el no nuclear. 
					
					En particular, describiendo el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC como "amenaza" a la paz mundial, legalizo practicamente la modernizacion de armas nucleares y el ataque preventivo nuclear contra ella. 
					
					Pronuncia tambien palabras provocativas tales como "no tolerara nunca el ataque nuclear del Norte de Corea contra EE.UU. y los paises amigos", "no habra el caso de que el Norte de Corea sobreviva despues de usar el arma nuclear" y "cualquier forma de ataque del Norte de Corea terminara con el arruinamiento de su poder". 
					
					Esto demuestra que llega al extremo la furia de guerra nuclear de la banda de Trump que intenta aplastar con la fuerza a la RPDC estigmatizando su justa posesion de arma nuclear frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					El "reporte de revision del estado nuclear" de EE.UU. es documento criminal que hace hecho consumado el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. Significa ademas la abierta declaracion del Estado gangster de que no repararia en dar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la Peninsula Coreana y todo el mundo ni en desatar la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Insatisfecho de tener el mayor numero de esas armas de exterminio masivo, EE.UU. quiere usarlas ahora como convencionales. Sin embargo, esta acusando a la RPDC con expresiones "amenaza nuclear" y "desnuclearizacion", lo cual parte de su cinismo y logica de bandido.
					
					La realidad confirma cuan sensata fue nuestra opcion de cumplir, en virtud de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, la historica causa de completar estas fuerzas del Estado para hacer frente a la escalada de amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que sera arruinado tragicamente si esgrime a su antojo el garrote nuclear de opresion sin liberarse de su anacronica ambicion de tomar la hegemonia mundial.
